[筆]
Phono-semantic compound ( 形聲 / 形声 , OC *prud ): semantic 竹 ( “ bamboo ” ) + phonetic 聿 ( OC *b·lud , “ writing brush ” ) . 聿 originally referred to this word; 竹 was added later to differentiate.

[笔]
Ideogrammic compound ( 會意 / 会意 ): 竹 ( “ bamboo ” ) + 毛 ( “ hair ” ) Traditional Chinese brushes were made of bamboo and hair.
